definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
Przevalski horse (Equus przewalskii) wild horse of Central Asia first identified in 1881 by Nikolai Mikhailovich Przevalski 普爾熱瓦爾斯基|普尔热瓦尔斯基
a wild horse that refuses to be bridled (a metaphor for sth that runs wild)

sentences.english: Zeal without knowledge is a runaway.
sentences.chinese: 沒有知識的熱情猶如脫繮野馬。

sentences.english: The Ford Mustang was originally based on the Ford Falcon compact.
sentences.chinese: 福特野馬是基於福特獵鷹系列小型車而生產的。

sentences.english: The cowboy caught the runaway horse with a rope.
sentences.chinese: 那個牛仔用套索套住了那匹失控的脫繮野馬。

sentences.english: He had almost touched the wild horse.
sentences.chinese: 他幾乎快要捱到這匹野馬了。

sentences.english: Her red mustang drove like a baby.
sentences.chinese: 她的紅色野馬脫繮而出。

sentences.english: Nick, her charming and successful husband, became a bolter.
sentences.chinese: 她賦有魅力而且事業成功的丈夫這時卻成了脫僵野馬。

sentences.english: Once Elaine starts playing a video game, wild horses can't drag her away from it.
sentences.chinese: 一旦伊蓮開始玩遊戲，野馬也沒法把她從屏幕前拉走。

sentences.english: Two stallions fight at a wild horse conservation center in South Dakota.
sentences.chinese: 在南達科塔的野馬保護中心裏兩匹雄馬在打架。

sentences.english: The wild horse bucked its second rider off.
sentences.chinese: 野馬猛然弓背躍起，把第二個騎手摔下了。

sentences.english: Romi is one of the 34 members of the Denver Broncos cheerleader team.
sentences.chinese: 露美是丹佛野馬拉拉隊的34名成員之一。

sentences.english: This wild bronco bucked its rider in just ten seconds.
sentences.chinese: 這匹野馬僅10秒鐘就弓背躍起把騎者摔了下來。

sentences.english: In 1964 the Ford motor company came out with a car they called the mustang.
sentences.chinese: 1964年福特汽車公司推出了一款名爲野馬的汽車。

sentences.english: The huge tornado kicked across the land like a wild bronco.
sentences.chinese: 巨大的龍捲風踢這片土地上宛如脫繮野馬。

sentences.english: Justin and Audrey looked forward to everything and anything!
sentences.chinese: 小貝貝像是脫繮野馬似的到處衝來衝去。

definition: (of waves) to surge forward/to roll on in waves/to gallop
grass mud horse/used as a substitute for 肏你媽|肏你妈[cao4 ni3 ma1], to mock or avoid censorship on the Internet
variant of 御[yu4]/to drive/to manage/to control
